pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, February 5, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, February 5, 2016:

Ottawa

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Big City Mayors, MP and Parliamentary Secretary to the Prime Minister Adam Vaughan, Federation of Canadian Municipalities (FCM) President Raymond Louis and FCM CEO Brock Carlton.

Railway Committee Room
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only.


10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with Gregor Robertson, Mayor of Vancouver and Chair of the Big City Mayors Caucus.

House of Commons Foyer
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 10:00 a.m.
  • Media should contact the Parliamentary Press Gallery for accreditation.


11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of British Columbia, Christy Clark.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only.


PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
